item.title: Chain of Preference Optimization: Improving Chain-of-Thought Reasoning in LLMs
item.description: Chain of Preference Optimization (CPO) dramatically improves LLM reasoning by leveraging ToT’s search tree for efficient fine-tuning, achieving similar or better performance with significantly reduced…
